There are few wounds as severe, fewer still that are worth the suffering that is Dead By Daylight. But even in the worst of moments, there is still a inkling of a promise that the next venture will be worth all the previous failures. It is not joy that the heart of this game beats to, but hope, for it is hope that defines the push to continue despite all the maddening situations that preceded.

鯖とキラーのゲームバランスが崩壊している以前に、キラーやる人が少なすぎて鯖が全然マッチングしない。
10～30分で最近は15分以上マッチングしない事がザラ。
アクティブ数も減ってるから、鯖やりたい人は違う非対称ゲームの方がいいと思う。
キラーやりたいって人は、マゾゲーになるけどマッチングはするから好きにしたらいいと思う。
運営はゲームバランス云々より、ゲームのプレー時間より待ち時間が長いことの対策をして欲しい。
正直オワコンだと思う。

Nachtrag mit über 140 Stunden Gametime: Sobald man das Spiel verstanden hat und in den höhreren MMRs spielt macht es als Killer keinen Spass mehr. Die Survivor sind bei weitem zu stark und als Killer kann man schon von einem guten Spiel reden wenn man 1 Kill bekommt. Und dann wird man auch noch von den toxischen Survs die meiste Zeit beleidigt, getrollt oder verspottet. Was leider keine Seltenheit ist.
Das Spiel scheint einen Mobbing-Simulator immer ähnlicher zu sein...

Cheater sind ein grauenhaftes Problem aber der Entwickler macht keinerlei Anstalten etwas dagegen zu tun ebenso wenig gegen dieses furchtbare Balancing.
Melden, egal bei was, bringt übrigens gar nichts. Die Devs juckt es nicht.

Schade. Das Spiel hätte viel Potential -.-

В игре вообще нет багов. Регистрация попаданий на высшем уровне. Разработчики очень хорошо постарались над балансом. Благодаря им в этой игре решает скилл, а не метовые перки и предметы. Каждый убийца имеет очень хороший геймплейный дизайн, что делает их почти равными по силе, а карты лишь изменяют визуальную составляющую игры, и не коим образом не вносят дисбаланс в игровой процесс. И наконец, за 5 лет игра набрала одно из самых добрых комьюнити <3

Jogo maravilhoso para se perder a sanidade e a fé na humanidade, te corroendo e lhe tornando uma pessoa pior por dentro. Estou cada vez mais xenofóbica com o tanto de argentino e chileno safado desse game... E sei que isso é errado. Minha mente acaba se deteriorando com o tanto de vezes que fui abandonada a morte quando era simples de ser ajudada. Do tanto de vezes que fui espancada no hook como se tivessem amaciando uma carne. Do tanto de vezes que olharem em meus olhos desde o primeiro gancho, esperando minha morte até o fim. Sinto falta de quando era mais pura. 

Recomendo demais.

I cannot defend this game anymore. Management at BHVR has shown that they do not care about improving the player experience and will instead do everything they can to continue to make you play in order to generate income throw rift passes and more recently, NFT's with the new Hellraiser DLC.

I bought this game back on release, and it was always a blast to get on and play. It's a unique game and there is pretty much nothing like it on the market that is worth playing other than this. If you want a game to get on and just mess around on casually, this is fine. If you plan on playing a lot and want to max out all of the characters, don't bother, it's a waste of time.

High-level design decisions are meant to make this game as grindy as Korean MMOs, if not more. I have 376 hours and I do not have one single killer character with even half of the perks on them, and I throw most of the progression currency, called bloodpoints (BP) on them. I realize that this isn't much compared to many other people who play this game, but it goes to show how much the grind there really is. 

The game has something called a "bloodweb" which you use BP to unlock items, add-ons, offerings, or perks. Perks are a vital part of the game and some characters are not viable at higher ranks unless they have certain perks. The bloodweb grind is much better than it used to be, but it is still rough for newer players and even more veteran players.

The reason for the grind being so ridiculous is that there are these things called "teachable" perks for each character that you can unlock at level 30, 35, and 40. These perks are "exclusive" to that character until you unlock the "teachable". The teachable perk now shows up in other characters bloodwebs. Now why is this a problem? There are 24 killers in Dead by Daylight. If you unlock all teachables for each killer, there are now 72 perks that you will need to unlock on each killer at minimum, this doesn't include the "general" perks that are available to every killer. Not only do you have to unlock 72 perks, you have to deal with perk tiers as well. Each perk has 3 tiers. It is possible for the a tier 2 or tier 3 perk to appear in the bloodweb even if you didn't unlock it at tier 1 yet, but it is pretty unlikely. Let's assume that we aren't lucky, we will then have to unlock 72 * 3 perks which is a total of 216. This is also only on one side, survivors have more perks that they have to unlock if they wanted to get all the teachables.

The game seems to not be wanting to let new or prospective players catch up to us more veteran players unless you are capable of grinding for 1000+ hours to get every perk on even one character.  I can't really in good conscience suggest this game to anyone at this point since it's just gotten frustratingly tedious to try and play.

- Ran around the woods with a chainsaw
- Found a person and sawed them down
- Sacrificed them on a meat hook
- Found and killed the rest of the people in the area
- Came home and played Dead By Daylight

10/10 would play again.

War anfangs mal nen richtig geiles Spiel. Leider wurden die Killer immer overpowerter (wie Freddy Krueger oder Jigsaw) wodurch einem ein starkes P2W-Gefühl vermittelt wurde, da die "normalen" Killer mit den neuen nicht mithalten konnten. Außerdem ist die Community extrem toxisch, egal ob man nun Killer ist oder Überlebender. Man sollte also direkt nach der Runde den Chat verlassen um sich keine Beleidigungen geben zu müssen warum man entweder mit einem starken Perk als Killer spielt oder am Haken campt (meiner Meinung nach auch eine legitime Taktik das Spiel zu spielen) oder man als Überlebender einen Teamkollegen hat sterben lassen, obwohl der Killer wie eben genannt am Haken campt und man dadurch nichts machen konnte.
Deathslinger mains are bitches

I've been a player ever since Pig came out, and my god have they not changed many issues with this damn game. I switched over to playing on my Nintendo, so I have a crap ton more hours on there all together with my 600+ hours, I would NOT recommend this game to anyone. I shame myself for even putting so much effort into a game that has such a trashy fan base its ridiculous. There's WAY too many toxic people on here and it's horrendous. A few weeks ago, I was playing with a streamer who got downed by a pallet, she fully recovered, I went to go help her up, she made it to where I threw down the pallet instead of helping her up, I got hooked shortly after, then she came over to me and pressed the button to save me then just left me there. The things people get away with on this game is horrible. I have been called so many slurs it's unbelievable, and I feel like nothing is gained when I report them cause then they'll continue to harass other people who did nothing wrong and were just playing the game. It's disgusting. Even though they "fixed" the lag switching issue, they absolutely did not. Hit boxes are beyond broken, 70% of the maps available are Killers sided, and the devs also acknowledge what the fans want for a new chapter, but they blow it off with some stupid chapter nobody asked for. I'm aware some licenses are harder to obtain, but I've been waiting for maybe 3 years for two specific ones and the devs know everyone wants them but continues to bring in licensed chapters nobody asked for (The Onyro). I'm taking a break from the game now, but I honestly might not ever touch it again due to these things. 
Edit: Another thing I forgot to mention, Dead Hard is completely broken. I press the button to Dead Hard, then it doesn't work. 90% of the time that's how I die is because the devs never fix any of the perks. Fuck you Behavior.
